actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to clarify the eligibility of small business homebuilding firms for assistance under the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Empowers, under the Small Business Act, the Small Business Administration to make loans to enable small business concerns to finance residential housing construction or rehabilitation for sale or rental, including the acquisition and development of land.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the eligibility of small business homebuilding firms for assistance under the Small Business Act.
